title: See How Much Money a YouTube Channel Earns: Free Tools

steps.title: Copy the channel's URL from YouTube that you want to research.
steps.content: Copy the channel's URL from YouTube that you want to research. You'll need the link to their channel, not just to a specific video for this to work. This should be in the format like https://www.youtube.com/@wikiHow To get the URL on a computer, click the name of the channel below a video. Then, highlight the URL in your browser's address bar and press Ctrl + C (PC) or Command + C (Mac) to copy it. To get the URL in the YouTube mobile app on Android, iPhone, or iPad: Tap the channel's name below any of their videos. Tap the description at the top of the page. Tap the URL under "More Info." You can then tap Copy link to copy the channel URL to your clipboard.

steps.title: Go to https://www.noxinfluencer.com/youtube/channel-calculator in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.noxinfluencer.com/youtube/channel-calculator in a web browser. You can use any desktop or mobile web browser to see an estimate of how much a YouTube channel earns. Some other alternatives are Social Blade , Speakerj , and Influencer Marketing Hub . These sites only require the YouTube username, not the channel URL.

steps.title: Paste the YouTube channel URL into the text box.
steps.content: Paste the YouTube channel URL into the text box. You'll see this under the header "YouTube Channel Calculator." To paste the URL, long-press or right-click the field and select Paste .

steps.title: Click or tap Read Now.
steps.content: Click or tap Read Now . You'll see this pink button to the right of the text field. You can also press ↵ Enter or ⏎ Return on your keyboard. You'll see the channel's logo appear centered below as well as a listing of their estimated earnings. You can learn more information about a statistic, like estimated partner earnings, by hovering your cursor over the question mark icon.
